## Browse by Category

Listing of all posts grouped by category.

::: {.callout-tip}
You can also filter categories from the sidebar on the home page.
:::

```{=html}
<style>
.quarto-listing-category-title { margin-top: 2rem; }
</style>
```

listing:
  contents: "posts/**/*.qmd"
  type: default
  sort: "date desc"
  group-by: category
  categories: true
  fields: [image, title, description, date, categories]
